Package org.smslib

Interface Summary
ICallListener  
ISmsMessageListener  
 

Class Summary
AbstractATHandler  
CDeviceInfo This class contains some information about the GSM modem/phone as well as some simple statistics (total inbound/outbound messages).
CDeviceInfo.CStatistics Statistics' class (total inbound/outbound messages).
CIncomingCall  
CIncomingMessage  
CIncomingMessage.MessageClass Holds values representing the message class of the message to be read from the GSM device.
CMessage This is the parent class defining a generic SMS message.
CMessage.MessageEncoding Holds values representing message encodings.
CMessage.MessageType Holds values representing message types.
CNewMsgMonitor  
COutgoingMessage This class represents a normal (text) outgoing / outbound message.
CSerialDriver  
CService This is the main SMSLib service class.
CService.Protocol Holds values representing the modem protocol used.
CService.ReceiveMode Holds values representing receive mode.
CStatusReportMessage  
CStatusReportMessage.DeliveryStatus Holds values representing the delivery status of a previously sent message.
CUtils  
CWapSIMessage  
CWapSIMessage.Signal  
 

Exception Summary
AlreadyConnectedException Exception thrown when the connection is already established.
InvalidPin2Exception Exception thrown when the GSM modem requires a PIN but the PIN given is not accepted.
InvalidPinException Exception thrown when the GSM modem requires a PIN but the PIN given is not accepted.
NoPduSupportException Exception thrown when the GSM modem does not support the PDU protocol.
NoPin2Exception Exception thrown when the GSM modem requires a PIN but no PIN is defined.
NoPinException Exception thrown when the GSM modem requires a PIN but no PIN is defined.
NoResponseException Exception thrown when the GSM modem does not respond.
NotConnectedException Exception thrown when an SMSLib operation is requested before the connection is established.
NoTextSupportException Exception thrown when the GSM modem does not support the TEXT protocol.
OopsException Fatal / Panic exception, this should never happen!
SMSLibException Generic Exception class (parent class) used for SMSLib specific exceptions.
